messages.subject: Re: Diet Change
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 09/12/2001 1:04:33 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... On a tv show called Grosse Pointe last year, one of the characters, an actress, had to gain
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 09/12/2001 1:04:33 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> A big group of friends of ours went jointly on a no-carbohydrate, no-sugar
> diet for a while a couple of years back. Lots lost weight. ALL got mean,
> paranoid, short-tempered, and they started fighting with each other, and
> yelling at people, and most of them went off the diet and were glad.
>
>

On a tv show called Grosse Pointe last year, one of the characters, an
actress, had to gain weight for a role she wanted in a movie. Once she
started eating her personality changed and another character said about her,
"All this time we thought she was a bitch---turns out she was just hungry."

Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
